name: Nighthaven Labs
description: Nighthaven Labs is a competitive map with many entry points and breach points that will make it tricky to hold a position for too long. Be prepared to be flanked in Nighthaven's HQ or to surprise your enemies by breaking in the R&D lab. Be careful to always watch your steps Operators!

externalTools.name: Stratbook.gg
externalTools.description: Team-oriented strategy planning tool for Rainbow Six Siege teams to create and share tactics.

externalTools.name: R6Strat
externalTools.description: Tool for creating, sharing, and viewing Rainbow Six Siege strategies with interactive map features.

externalTools.name: R6 Calls
externalTools.description: Resource for learning and practicing map callouts used in Rainbow Six Siege.
